title: Did the man who supervised Ryd bin Laden say it would be an "honor" if President Trump canceled his security clearance?
subtitle: William McRaven wrote, "I consider it an honour for you to cancel my security clearance as well, so that I can add my name to the list of men and women who have spoken against your presidency."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The retired Navy Admiral William McRaven wrote that he would consider it an honor if President Donald Trump canceled his security clearance.
